{!Contact.Name} HAVE YOU REGISTERED TO VOTE?
Dear {!Contact.Name},
With the EU Referendum fastly approaching, you should make sure you have your say and register to vote today!
Click here to register to vote now!
Why should you register?
- Even if you're not old enough to vote yet, simply being on the register does so much for you!
- Just being on the register means politicians can't ignore you or fellow young people when making decisions about your country.
- So if you're passionate about politics, want to have your say in society and know if you're in or out, then register to vote today!
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager - South West London
